trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Portsmouth
There were no other sightings in Portsmouth on or around March 5th 2007
Summary: another ufo sighting in suffolk, va this time on tape.
divs: Sighting Detailsthis is a long story. it started in oct 2005 when i witnessed ufo activity for 3 straight nights. jets were in formations over strange objects in the sky. on the third night i witnessed a gigantic triangular shaped object totally silent, very slow moving. every since then i have had encounters with smaller objects, following me i believe. anyway on march 5, 2007 at about 1955 in the evening i left my apartment to go to my mothers home. i immediatly noticed the all familiar orbs of light that appear every so often. there were two of them, about 1000-1500 ft off the ground, hovering and changing colors. i began to film one of them with my camera phone. when observing the object on the camera screen it shows a large orb with smaller lights rotating around it. i will be sending this video. another great video of some of the cases that happened in virginia in 2005 can be seen at pilotonline.com.
